caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. RICARDO ALPHONSO

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.

opinion.posture: Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Superior Court, No. 490 W.D. Allocatur Docket 2000.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 18th day of January 2001, the petition for allowance of appeal is DENIED.
